## CredentialManager.storeCredentials() method

Stores user credentials securely.

**Signature:**

```typescript
storeCredentials(data: CredentialData): Promise<boolean>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  data | [CredentialData](./foundation-comms.credentialdata_2.md) | The credential data to be stored. |

**Returns:**

Promise&lt;boolean&gt;

A Promise that resolves to a boolean indicating if the credentials were stored successfully.
